Sign In

Email Address setEmail(e.target.value)} style={{ fontSize: '1.5rem', padding: '1rem' }} /> Password setPassword(e.target.value)} style={{ fontSize: '1.5rem', padding: '1rem' }} />
) } export default LoginScreen
